channel.title: Item Bonuses
channel.description:
If you think this is going to be about the item.cfg slap yourself now... im not that stupid.
When i equip an item ingame for some reason the bonuses of the item won't load ... but ... if i ... say ... put on full rune then remove the helm the bonuses of the plate, legs, and kite would then show up I think im missing a method somewhere but I don't know which one if someone could post the method that adds bonuses when you put an item on it would be appreciated

item.title: Item Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

If you think this is going to be about the item.cfg slap yourself now… im not that stupid.

When i equip an item ingame for some reason the bonuses of the item won’t load … but … if i … say … put on full rune then remove the helm the bonuses of the plate, legs, and kite would then show up I think im missing a method somewhere but I don’t know which one if someone could post the method that adds bonuses when you put an item on it would be appreciated
